structure.unit: COUNTY ROAD ENGINEER AND MAINTENANCE OF PUBLIC ROADS

law.history: Repealed 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 60, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 216aa-22, 4356o.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Fiscal court may require men to work on roads; compensation.
